ref: Axaz ku le ƒe 746 D.M.Ŋ . me , eye via Xizkiya xɔ ɖe eteƒe . Ɣemaɣi la , Yuda - dukɔa da ahe eye wodzudzɔ Yehowa subɔsubɔ .

text: Ahithophel , David 's trusted counselor , turned traitor and joined in a rebellion against David .
ref: Axitofel , si nye eƒe aɖaŋuɖola si dzi wòkana ɖo hã va zu egɔmezɔla , eye wòwɔ ɖeka kple ame siwo dze aglã ɖe David ŋu .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
ref: Azɔ , mi ́ ame siwo xɔe se la ge ɖe dzudzɔ ma me abe ale si Mawu ŋutɔ gblɔe ene be , " Eya ta meka atam le nye dziku me be , womage ɖe nye dzudzɔƒe la me akpɔ o . " Ke ha ̃ la ewu eƒe dɔ la nu tso xexeame ƒe gɔmedzedzea me ke .

text: Again he denied it with an oath , " I don 't know the man . "
ref: Azɔ Petro ka atam be , " Nyemenya ŋutsu la le afi aɖeke kura kpɔ o ! "

text: The soldiers then asked each man to sign a paper showing that he had consented to join the army .
ref: Azɔ asrafoawo bia tso amesiame si be wòade asi agbalẽ te atsɔ aɖee fia be yelɔ ̃ be yeage ɖe asrafoawo me .

text: Then he said to them : " ' Cast the net on the right side of the boat and you will find some . '
ref: Azɔ egblɔ na wo be : " ' Mida ɖɔ la ɖe ʋua ƒe ɖusime , eye miakpɔ lã aɖe . '

text: Also , as a result of having true joy , we will reject a materialistic way of life and will instead seek to make greater personal sacrifices in behalf of God 's Kingdom .
ref: Azɔ hã , ne dzidzɔ vavãtɔ su mía si la , míava kpɔe be menye ŋutilãmenunɔamesiwoe le vevie le agbe me o , eye míatsɔ nu geɖe wu asa vɔe le Mawu Fiaɖuƒea ta .
